text.text: The following points are things to continually consider about your engagement:
- Include participants in planning and decision-making discussions and reports of results.
- Inform participants regularly about project progress and how their contributions have impacted the project.
- Evalutate your project throughout with participants to ensure it is meeting the needs of your community.
- Stay up to date by attending pre-existing community group meetings to continue to learn about their needs and goals. This demonstrates commitment and builds trust with community members.
